website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an inexpensive action camera, the Crosstour is going to be a good bet.
pros: Can be controlled remotely with an App on your phone
Comes with a lot of attachments
cons: This camera only shoots in 1080P, it does not have 4K capacity

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great quality camera
customer_reviews.text: The Crosstour camera is easy to use. It takes great pictures and videos. You can control it remotely with your phone through the WIFI connection and the free iSmart DV app. I like to use it on my motorcycle to take videos which I can edit with a free app such as Oneshot Video Editor, creating a video with all the highlights from my ride that I can share on Facebook. I definitely recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: AntOfTom

customer_reviews.title: Best quality camera/video camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this camera! We recently took it on vacation and it takes excellent quality photos and video. We used it under water and the quality is great. We have given them as a gift to family as well. Highly recommend. Great price for high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great quality action cam
customer_reviews.text: This is the first action camera I ever bought. I was looking for something affordable with great picture quality. I love to go hiking and explore new places. This will be a great companion to capture all those precious moments. I took some of the pictures from this and they were of great quality. Built in quality looks similar to expensive action camera. It was easy to use and comes with lots of stuffs. Had this came with memory card too, it would have been an icing on the cake. I had to buy memory card separately and I am fine with that because of its pricing.
customer_reviews.author: REENA MAHARJAN

customer_reviews.title: $40 to $500..same output..
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this: got it 2daya later, within minutes ..of opening,i was making videos for the grams.. with the supplied kit that came with it to attach to a existing mount i had..dont forget you need a sd micro.. i had a 2gig which is roughly 10mins a gig..wifi connect requires you to search for wifi and its named action cam in your wifi search..on phone..easy to use and emotionality easier to lose over a 500dollar gopro with same video out out..also used a program called quik for android.
customer_reviews.author: FAILWISH

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: this is the second camera that I have bought. I owned GoPro's before and the accessories alone is the same price as this product. I do a lot of mountain biking and outdoors activities and need a camera with a couple extra batteries that won't break the bank and this camera meets and exceeds my expectations. The battery last over a hour and I purchased 2 extra one and a 2 battery charger for 15 bucks can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaws

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I struggled with an idea for my 9ish stepson's christmas present. He is super fun active kid. I barely see him and he spends most of his time with mom. I thought of a gopro type camera and rolled with it. It was perfect, this one is perfect. He went crazy when he saw it. Memory card was 5 more dollars. Perfect for mounting on helmets or for making "minecraft videos" or so I'm told. My dad bought the upgraded version for my mom for Christmas, and I think I'll buy one and try it in the car. Did get the amazon warrenty too just in case.
customer_reviews.author: H. HunTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Does everything, the most versatile camera ever.
customer_reviews.text: If I had known....................... I would have been buying this instead of cameras that can only do one thing and usually not very well. This camera is wide screen which is absolutely necessary, it has stabilization, also a must have, and the low light video is amazing. The accessories included allow me to do anything I want, use it on my motorcycle, as a car cam, or even as a strap on body cam. The fact that it is self contained battery powered makes it ever so usable in whatever situation I could find myself.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera Especially Considering the Price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a sports camera but not bad enough to pay hundreds of $$$ for a GoPro. This one is cheap enough that if it lasts a year, I'll just buy a new one. The mounting system is a bit like playing with Legos so it will take some time, trial and error to find a good mounting position. If you're looking for a great gift for your wedding anniversary that will come off as being more expensive than it really is, this is your gift. I promise, she'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: For the price it works very well
customer_reviews.text: If you want to compare this camera to a $300 or $400 GoPro, well that's not fair. This camera costs 1/10th of what they do. For the price it works very well. It comes with plenty of mounting options. I mounted it on a motorcycle helmet and went out for a ride. It captured the video of the ride very well. On the way home there was light rain. The case kept the camera dry and it recorded fine in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Pike

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first action cam so my experience with them is limited, but I can say that for the price this camera is one heck of a deal. Works just as advertised. I mounted mine on a helmet to record my dirt bike adventures. Easy to use. Easy menu navigation. I didn't like the fish eye lens effect using the 1080p @ 30fps setting so I set mine to 720p @ 60fps, and it looks better. Good price. Good product. Thank you Crosstour!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old son loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend the money for a Go-Pro considering that this would be for my 9 year old. We got it yesterday and he was so excited to get it charged and up and running. He attached it to his skateboard helmet and already used it! He came back and put the video up on our computer. Super easy to figure out. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LuvMy2Boys

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the $ and totally waterproof at shallow snorkeling depths
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as backup camera at last minute after I bought a GoPro hero 7 white and saw all the poor online reviews. Side by side the GoPro is probably slightly better, but for the money this one can’t be beat. Who knows how long it will last but at $40 you can buy 5 of these vs one GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: For the cost of this camera it's quite amazing. We've only had it for a short time so I'm unsure about durability but the picture quality seems to be pretty good so far. Our first order had a slight malfunction with the sd card not staying in and the company promptly sent us out a different one. Customer service was easy and good to deal with. The sound on the camera doesn't seem to great but that might just be when listening to it from the camera speakers. My 10 year old is very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cari Batty

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera is very handy and great partner, you gan take it any where, take picture of you driving downtowm. go with you diving and almost accompany you everywhere. Its cheap and produced quality picture for you,
customer_reviews.author: Mani Weser

customer_reviews.title: This camera is not 1080P HD
customer_reviews.text: From the reviews I've read, I thought this would be worth buying. It is no better than the 15 car camera I bought at Walmart. Very disappointing. The included accessories are worth it if they fit the GoPro cameras. If this was at least a good 720 quality, I would keep it. But it's very jittery in movements and the slo-mo is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: BobHatMan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for a cruise. You will not be disappointed. Practice with your buttons ahead of time because once you get in the sun it is hard to read your status. Takes great photos and video and connects by wifi to your cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jane8456.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera For Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This camera not only comes at a great price, but it comes with a ton of accessories that make it so you can use this camera in any situation you can think of. The WiFi controls make it even better and easier to use without having to handle the camera directly. I highly recommend this camera to anyone looking to get a great camera with accessories at a great price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Janssen

customer_reviews.title: this is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing!! you wont be upset and for the price of it, you get what you pay for but wow am I shocked for how affordable yet reliable it is. Comes with plenty of accessories, charger, and batteries. I ended up buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy11

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for videos on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take videos and and pictures while I hunt. The camera is easy to set up. Comes with two batteries. It has many attachments with it to set it up how you would like. I have it mounted to scope on my gun. I used the handle bar attachment. Hoping to get the perfect video
customer_reviews.author: matthew falkinburg

customer_reviews.title: Everything it Claims to be
customer_reviews.text: It arrived promptly, had everything it said it would in the description. Image quality on still is great even at small setting, the video is fantastic in 1080p. The wireless controller works better then expected, even able to view on phone what is recording. Only issue I wish I could modify settings from the app. User interface is clear and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent D Miles IV

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Easy to figure out and take a video. I had the camera installed with the accessories provided on my RC plane in 20 minutes and flew to take a video the same day the camera arrived. The quality of the video is fantastic. It is sold with 2 batteries and lots of connecting accessories. I love this camera
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Really good camera at this price point
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this camera this past weekend. It showed up really quick and in great packaging. I took it out and took some test video. I was really impressed. I've used Gopros in the past and video quality with this was right up there for a fraction of the cost. I've also tried another "budget" camera that was around the same price as this one and must say it stunk. Make sure to read reviews.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for Outdoor Adventures
customer_reviews.text: These cameras are awesome for such a low price point. I've taken it skiing, kayaking, and fishing. It has a ton of mount options and has allowed me to capture great family and sports adventures in the past year. It's been in water, snow, etc. and has held up well without any issues. The wifi connectivity to my phone is also easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: William N.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera for a low price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera. I liked it so much I got another one. Each battery lasted over an hour and the video quality was great for the price. It also comes with tons of extra attachments so you can mount it to just about anything. Should be great for my hunt next week.
customer_reviews.author: Slingshot

customer_reviews.title: Great action camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to use while skiing - the app for iOS/Android makes this very easy to use when the camera is attached to your helmet or somewhere that you cannot easily access the controls. I have a GoPro that I paid much more for that is only slightly better in terms of quality - for the price this cant be beat
customer_reviews.author: Justin Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Great Mini Camera
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for our ski trip, easy to use and take amazing video
customer_reviews.author: Eric W. Gast

customer_reviews.title: A lot of camera for a little price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to take to Oahu and wanted to make sure I was able to get quality pictures while snorkeling since there usually isn't a 2nd chance. After receiving the camera I was impressed with the design and quality. It has so many extras that I was shocked. After all the research that I did I am convinced that I made the right choice. Can't wait to use this camera.
customer_reviews.author: RTrivett

customer_reviews.title: The best video camera gotta love it!
customer_reviews.text: My order was delivered promptly, the packaging was very stout and undamaged. This ct7000 is unbelievable for the price. Picture quality is the best, and waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Wild Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great quality photos for great price
customer_reviews.text: I like how versatile this camera is. I also like that it's wifi-enabled so you can use it with the app. It's small but it does a lot. I've only had it for a few days so I still have some learning to do. So far so good, I'll be going on a cruise soon so I'll get to use the waterproof camera when we go to the pool and beach.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda Harvey

customer_reviews.title: VERY FUN NEW TOY
customer_reviews.text: My little man was looking forward to own an action camera and after much research, we decided to give this one a try; he is very excited with everything this little toy has to offer; it appears to have exceeded his expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Parmer

customer_reviews.title: Great action cam for motorcycle helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great action cam for the price. I didn’t want to spend hundreds of dollars for a better known brand. This does exactly what I want it to do. It’s mounted on my motorcycle helmet with the provided hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Affordable action camera
customer_reviews.text: Great action camera for the price! Came with all the attachments I need.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Raweewonrungjumrus

customer_reviews.title: Decent camera
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent camera. Will do the job for I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: chicago cubs fan

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: its amazing product and easy to use... I like it so much and I recommend it to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Haider

customer_reviews.title: So far, so fun!
customer_reviews.text: Have had a fun time so far with this camera. Recorded parts of a fishing trip with my family and enjoyed getting video without having to worry about holding a camera the whole time! Decent audio, great video!
customer_reviews.author: user23875

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this camera! I’m mostly using this camera for gameplay at airsoft events and it suits my needs. It’s extremely inexpensive compared to other cameras and it does the same job as the expensive cameras. With this camera you also get a ton of cool mounts and other little accessories. 11/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: CodysReview

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Took on a trip to thailand worked out great once i figured out how to work it great product good video pictures
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The original camera was a bit defected, contacted the manufacturer and they helped me with my issues. The camera works great and takes really good pictures. The wide lens on the camera is great.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Aleman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves to make videos and pretend she is a YouTuber. This was #1 on her Christmas list this year
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Photo feature doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Following the instructions to take a photo, you click on "Car" to access the photo feature. When I do that a message appears, "File Not Found." When I emailed the company's customer support, no response received. Also note: when plugged into an iMac you get the message, "PC Camera."
customer_reviews.author: Rod Maciver

customer_reviews.title: Issues with this camera
customer_reviews.text: Hi, so far my experience has been negative. After charging the camera and turning it on it powers off instantly, can't even use it. Can I ask for a return?
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela P.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price point
customer_reviews.text: This camera works great. Have not used under water yet but plan on it. Overall a good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for money. Great accessories.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this product, bought to use on my Bicycle and the picture quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: So many uses for this action camera
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful gift to give my son for an upcoming adventure trip to Australia and New Zealand! This will allow him to take pictures of all the scenery, even under water at the Great Barrier Reef!
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this before a trip to Florida over the winter. My son used it fishing - early morning before sunrise. The picture quality was incredible, and as the sun rose, the image quality was stunning! Sturdy construction and all accessories including waterproof case were included. Later in the week, we used it in the pools, hot tub, waterslides and around the resort. It captured our vacation in a whole new way! Thank you for such an amazing camera at a VERY LOW price! I have recommended to many .... why pay the prices for a Go Pro when you could purchase this!
customer_reviews.author: Mercer Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: So far, great value. There are so many attachments included, and it's so easy to use. I was pleasantly surprised, I wasnt expecting any of this!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Most certainly exceeds my expectation. I had purchased this for my sons birthday as he's a YouTube fanatic and needed a "go-pro" Needless to say at 9 years old, he's def not getting the real deal. We charged it, turned it on, downloaded the app and off he went, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Senkiw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great quality and support and accessories
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using the camera. Very easy to set up, lots of different accessories which is great and great communication and support form the vendor. The camera has the features I wanted - like ability to record over previously recorded material automatically which is important in my use as a bicycle cam. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: So happy I got this instead of a go pro!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an action camera but I am not willing to pay $300 for it. I took it on a cruise and it is amazing. I also bought an accessory package to add more options like the selfie stick and underwater stick. The camera is so light weight and easy to use. I had to use the instructions a few times and now I am a pro with it. It gives amazing pictures and video. They are super clear. I would recommend this product to everyone that is looking for an action camera.
customer_reviews.author: W. Biehl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young adventurers
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, sturdy camera. Stands up to use by a 7 year old!
customer_reviews.author: LAC

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its a really good action camera, with a lot of accesories, really affordable. Pros: The price, 2 batteries. Cons: no yet
customer_reviews.author: eartiles

customer_reviews.title: Decent video at decent price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera to use to take towing videos. Price is very reasonable. Video quality is better then I expected
customer_reviews.author: mathew

customer_reviews.title: Fun little camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera arrived yesterday, easy to set up, good pictures and videos for a small camera. So far I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 1080p camera
customer_reviews.text: The best camera I ever bought lightweight and easy to use will tell my family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to Underwater Movies
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to Hawaii next month and will be Scuba Diving on a Wreck and then a Reef! I wanted to be able to take video and photos and needed an underwater camera! Scuba Diving magazine rated CrossTour the BEST deal, so I bought it. I’m still getting to know it, after I’ve set the Date and Time, Camera Burst rate and stabilizing feature. It came w two batteries, but I needed a charger to make quick battery / memory card changes between dives on the Dive Boat! I bought a 2nd 32GB memory card, because I intend to take a lot of pictures in Hawaii. Looking forward to using it to the Max! Thanks CrossTour!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Conway

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Quality! Great Price & Fast Shipping! I’m impressed with the quality of the image. I don’t leave a lot of reviews but this iteam definitely approved my expectations. Highly recommend👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: cris

customer_reviews.title: Good working camera. Action camera working great on motorcycle riding
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great picture, videos. Easy to use. Great batteries. Charge through camera with included usb cord. I bought the extra batteries and charger and I’m very very pleased with everything. I even bought the accessories package. Somethings are already with the camera. But I Love the extra accessories
customer_reviews.author: Phil Atchio

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and quality is as good as Hero 5
customer_reviews.author: Birender Singh

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. It broke the second time I tried to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great quality. Arrive just in time for my trip to Italy
customer_reviews.author: Bomlee

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a fun little camera for a great price and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Competent Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because I was going on a trip to the Great Barrier Reef and I wanted an underwater camera without paying a bunch. This camera turned out to be a good buy. It takes decent video and pictures, andI have not run out of battery yet. The ease of use wasn't that great as I had to look up on YouTube how to use some of the camera functions.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Is very small
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love this camera great quality camera best action camera I ever had
customer_reviews.author: Tyleeia

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: A friend used one on our trip to Hawaii, and it took great underwater videos of swimming with the sea turtles and coral. As soon as we came home we purchased one for our next great adventure.
customer_reviews.author: G Pinkerton

customer_reviews.title: Nice price
customer_reviews.text: I like this action camera even though my purposes are geared as a concert goer. It will be useful when I bring it to pan a concert hall from the balcony. For some reason I dislike having to fiddle with my cell phone for pics and video so this CrossTour fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So this camera first off is so (light weight) which is good but I think its cuz its (cheaply made) but the (packaging was awesome) it came right away and it's got an (instructional manual) and everything it (fits all my go pro7 stuff) except the (batterys are totally different than go pro 7) I just wish it had stabilization like the go pro
customer_reviews.author: Jay w.

customer_reviews.title: Great Action Camera
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very fast I received it within 2 days with out prime. I highly recommend this item. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Mccrickard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pics/videos
customer_reviews.text: For this camera being so small as you can see it takes amazing pics and video. We had a 20 min video underwater as well. It’s posted on YouTube under nettieb77@gmail.com Bahamas 2019 if u want to see the camera quality. I think the instructions could have been better with connection to the app and such... we did a lot of YouTubing to figure it out. But once we got it going as u can see it is well worth it! I absolutely love it!! Buy it! U won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Watch the video on "How to use Crosstour Action Camera Accessories"
customer_reviews.text: Like: Good picture quality. WiFi connection. Dislike: Nowhere to attach a wrist strap to waterproof case
customer_reviews.author: Glenbrook64

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, comes with goodies
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our kids, who really wanted a digital camera. It's a lot smaller than expected, which was unfortunate (think go-pro), but does come with a lot of gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a nice camera.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, haven't used it. It is for a gift. Reviews sounded good. Hope it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera was great! Got it as a gift for my sibling and it was perfect for what they needed. Packaging was nicely done
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and it shows
customer_reviews.text: There is no zoom. Resolution beyond about 15ft isn't usable and with the wide field of view it's difficult to frame an interesting image. On the plus side it did survive 6ft of water.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera compared to a go pro
customer_reviews.text: Cute lil camers. TONS of accessories. Pretty simple to use. The instructions are not simplified tho. Takes some time to figure out which pieces are for what and how to put them together. But, the camera itself works great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have fun with my camera, easy to mount in my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morales

customer_reviews.title: This IS A fabulous buy
customer_reviews.text: Only thing Id have liked is a little better instructional manual. I'm one who typically doesnt even use instructions but they give you SO MANY accessories im not sure what does go w what/ where strap attaches... But honestly the guy saying it's almost underpriced for quality and product is right! This thing is as good as any expensive camera, comes w extra battery and all you need and works GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: AngelaC18

customer_reviews.title: Great camera at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little action camera! I charged the battery and began using the camera right out of the box. It took a little time to figure out all of the mounting accessories but there are some good videos out there that helped with that. I used it in the pool, in and out of the water and was so happy with the quality of the video. I'm looking forward to using it on my next snorkeling trip.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Not great but does its job.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so my son could take videos on vacation. Its great for a kid but the quality isnt that great. The volume is terrible using the waterproof container.
customer_reviews.author: Ditka2k7

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: I like the price and the durability. I don't like how difficult it is to navigate the settings. It's not as use friendly as the Victure of the same type. Very high quality components and great for off road.
customer_reviews.author: J. Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Best All Round Camera
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually put in reviews for purchases. However, I'm impressed at the options because they add all these little plastic accessories which make this camera practical without making it pricier. I recommend this for when you want to share your experiences whether you travel or not. Thank you Crosstour!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Upset and want my money back
customer_reviews.text: I gave everything 1 Star. My camera doesn’t even record for more than about 28 seconds, of even. I am very upset with this product because it has so many good reviews. I bought this to go hiking and now I am out 40 bucks. I thought this would be a great camera but I should have spent a little more money to get a better quality product. By better quality, I mean one that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a good value. The picture quality is a little grainy, but for the price I can't complain. I got it for my son who really enjoys using it. It does have quite a few features and comes with a great accessory kit. I would recommend especially for kids.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stenhouse

customer_reviews.title: Good for those who havent the money for Gopro
customer_reviews.text: I needed some form of camera for underwater, and Gopros are way too expensive for me. But this is a nice alternative to get what you want with a budget. The quality is good, it does its job, and you need to charge the battery it came with prior to use (thats a given, but the battery feels like it has a shorter life than if you got additional ones and charged those as well.) Get a charger for this if its in the bundle.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first CT7000 a couple of months ago and i'm so happy with it that i bought the second one easy to set up and use and the video is great! will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Present for my husband. He loved it. Great for the price and so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: many accesries included
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised with all the adapters for mountings icluded.
customer_reviews.author: Judy and Ron

customer_reviews.title: Passed the Leak Test and Ready for Snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Crosstour Action Camera CT7000 for my trip to Jamaica in December. Everything arrived as expected, and the camera and accessories were packaged very well. I plan to use the camera for underwater photos and videos while snorkeling. I’ve done the leak test by putting a piece of paper in the underwater case and submerging it in a bucket of water. The Crosstour Action Camera passed with flying colors — no leaks! Can’t wait to use it on my trip!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great underwater resolution
customer_reviews.text: It's really practical when swimming. But the life of batteries was not so long when recording long videos. I like it anyways for the quality of the image and the utility.
customer_reviews.author: FrequentShopperUS

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy worked like a champ!!! We used it for all our underwater videos in Maui. I was nervous because of the price but I read all the reviews and I’m thrilled with this purchase!! 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for Christmas and it worked ok at first but after a day of using it started messing up. It won’t accept the SD we have been using with it that once worked and we can’t get it to work with our computer
customer_reviews.author: Tiffyy227

customer_reviews.title: So far, so great!
customer_reviews.text: Once you've got the hang of the buttons it's pretty easy to maneuver. I am still just in the beginning of using it, the real test will be at an upcoming vacation, but the fact it's easy to use is a great start.
customer_reviews.author: S Jay

customer_reviews.title: Blurry
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed! After reading so many reviews about photo clarity I was excited to use this for a trip. The photos look worse than a razr flip phone. However I guess these action cameras shouldn't be used for pictures. Bummer because it is a really cool device with great accessories!
customer_reviews.author: Richie Findlater

customer_reviews.title: Decent Camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Two batteries is a nice bonus. Plenty of mounting options. Image quality seems good. I mounted it to my motorcycle and have used it on one test ride so far.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Priell

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner, or budget, camera.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper, but not noticeably worse than, the GoPro brand. Perfect for a younger person who is just getting the hang of making videos to keep or post. Videos are very decent quality and easy to work with post production.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cathey

customer_reviews.title: Good for someone wanting a go pro but not wanting to spend the go pro price
customer_reviews.text: Good little first time camera. Better this price than a go pro for a first time. The wifi it produces has pretty decent range. My only complaint is I cant view video only pictures off its wifi. But then again first one and I can upgrade and still pay a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: MosH

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Over all very happy with this camera. The battery life is not very good. No where near the time stated. But replacement batteries are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Eightbll

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: working well..I need to use 2 batteries for a 1 1/2 bike ride but not a problem exchanging them..Picture quality is great...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Boy loved it. Has taken it with him to the beach and river rafting.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for families
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera to use on our family vacation. I wanted something easy to use and inexpensive for our kids (ages 11-15) to use at the beach and while snorkeling. This camera was perfect! The kids used it with ease and the picture quality was good.
customer_reviews.author: Quan B

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at an AMAZING price ! Bought for kitesurfing. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Speedreef

product_meta.title: Crosstour Action Camera 1080P Full HD Wi-Fi 12MP Waterproof Cam 2" LCD 30m Underwater 170°Wide-Angle Sports Camera with 2 Rechargeable 1050mAh Batteries and Mounting Accessory Kits (CT7000-U)
feature_bullets: Great Companion of Your Daily - 1080P Full HD video resolution and built-in microphone vividly record your precious memories with friends, kids and pets. Whether in the air, on land or in the water.
Most Suitable Sports Camera - With bonus mounting accessories included, you can install the camera easily on your bicycle, drone, ski board helmet. Also it's compatible with most Gopro accessories.

Simply Process Videos and Photos - You can directly playback videos or delete unsatisfactory files on the 2-inch-screen camera, don’t need to worry about the full memory of micro SD card during your trip.

Share Your Beautiful Footage - Control it in “iSmart DV” app on your phone via Wi-Fi, freely download your beautiful footages and share on your Facebook, Twitter or Youtube. You can also stream real-time video through micro HDMI port.
Amazing Multi-role Camera - The small cam can be used as a car camera with looping video function and also a webcam for live or video chatting via the USB cable included.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars351 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
